footer.text: Character Guide • Build: Shikanoin Heizou | Update Date: 08/05/2022 | Editor: Luno#1337

fields.name: Replacement Weapon:
fields.value: Solar Pearl, Lost Prayers, Kagura Verity, The Widsith, Sacrificial Fragments, Solar Pearl

fields.name: Main Stats Priority
fields.value: <sands>  ATK % | <goblet> Anemo DMG bonus | <circlet>  CRIT Rate or DMG

fields.name: Talent Priority
fields.value:
**1)** Elemental Skill: Heartstopper Strike
**2)** Normal Attack:  Fudou Style Martial Arts
**3)** Elemental Burst: Windmuster Kick

fields.name: Notes:
fields.value: 4 Viridescent Venerer is the best artifact set by far for Heizou. In teams that already have an anemo running the 4-piece effect or mono ge/ anemo team compositions, running 2-piece set combinations on Heizou is an option.
